PrototypeCheck.description: Prototypes can only be defined with either EXT, EXTPGM or EXTPROC

ForceOptionalParens.description: Expressions must be surrounded by brackets.

NoSELECTAll.description: 'SELECT *' is not allowed in Embedded SQL.

UselessOperationCheck.description: Redundant operation codes (EVAL, CALLP) not allowed.

IncorrectVariableCase.description: Variable names must match the case of the definition.

RequiresParameter.description: Parentheses must be used on a procedure call, even if it has no parameters.

RequiresProcedureDescription.description: Procedure titles and descriptions must be provided.

StringLiteralDupe.description: Duplicate string literals are not allowed.

RequireBlankSpecial.description: *BLANK must be used over empty string literals.

CopybookDirective.description: Force which directive which must be used to include other source. (Copy or Include)

NoSQLJoins.description: JOINs in Embedded SQL are not allowed.

NoGlobalsInProcedures.description: Globals are not allowed in procedures.

operation.description: The operation code, declaration or built-in function to check. Can use the following special values: `*DECLARE`, `*BIF`

expected.description: The expected casing of the operation code, declaration or built-in function. Can use the following special values: `*LOWER`, `*UPPER`

SpecificCasing.description: Specific casing for op codes, declartions or built-in functions codes.

PrettyComments.description: Comments cannot be blank, must start with a space and have correct indentation.

NoLocalSubroutines.description: Subroutines in procedures are not allowed.

NoExternalTo.description: Calls to certain APIs are not allowed. (EXTPROC / EXTPGM)

NoExecuteImmediate.description: Embedded SQL statement with EXECUTE IMMEDIATE not allowed.

NoExtProgramVariable.description: Declaring a prototype with EXTPGM and EXTPROC using a procedure is now allowed.

IncludeMustBeRelative.description: When using copy or include statements, path must be relative. For members, you must at least include the source file. For streamfiles, it is relative from the working directory.

SQLHostVarCheck.description: Warns when referencing variables in Embedded SQL that are also defined locally.
